trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class for composable part catalogs, which collect and return <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa a classe base abstrata para catálogos de parte combinável, que coletam e retornam objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo implementa o <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Quando você terminar de usar o tipo, descarte-direta ou indiretamente.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: Para descartar o tipo diretamente, chame seu <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> método em um `try` / `catch` bloco.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Para descartar indiretamente dele, use uma construção de linguagem, como `using` (em c#) ou `Using` (no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a seção "Usando um objeto que implementa IDisposable" o <xref:System.IDisposable> tópico de interface.

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo é thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar `Dispose` quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog>.

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O `Dispose` método deixa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar `Dispose`, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar `Dispose` antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que itera por meio do catálogo.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar por meio do catálogo.

trans-unit.source: The conditions of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects to be returned.
trans-unit.target: As condições dos objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> a serem retornados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of export definitions that match the constraint defined by the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de definições de exportação que correspondem à restrição definida pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Tuple`2" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects and their associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> objects for objects that match the constraint specified by <paramref name="definition" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.Tuple`2" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> e seus objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> associados para objetos que correspondem à restrição especificada por <paramref name="definition" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this method should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Substituições desse método devem retornar nunca `null`.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition> matches the conditions defined by `definition`, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition> corresponde às condições definidas pelo `definition`, retornar vazio <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="definition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="definition" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the part definitions that are contained in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as definições de parte contidas no catálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> contained in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> contido no <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Substituições dessa propriedade nunca devem retornar `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que itera por meio do catálogo.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar por meio do catálogo.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
